description:
A god duels an eight-headed snake.  A horse is taken from its mother at a lake.  A demon confronts the horror of yam-eating peasants.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yamata no Orochi / Ikezuki / Oni to Yamaimo
Yamata no Orochi / Lake Moon / The Demon and the Chinese Yam
ヤマタノオロチ / 池月 / 鬼と長芋
